article_title: Protesters disrupt Black Friday in Chicago
article_text:
Photo Gallery

Protesters disrupt Black Friday in Chicago

Prev 1 2 Next

Demonstrators shrugged off rain to turn the start of the holiday shopping season on Michigan Ave. into a chance to cite the killing of Laquan McDonald, 17, as an example of what they call the systemic disregard police show for black people.
